title: Neurotimer
description: A Pomodoro timer web app designed to improve focus with ambient soundscapes. Users can choose between pink noise, brown noise, and coffee shop sounds, each with tooltips explaining their cognitive benefits.

title: What's Your Elemental Sign?
description: A fullstack app that calculates the dominant element (Fire, Earth, Air, or Water) in a user's birth chart. Users input birth data, and the app returns an analysis based on astrology logic.
